gameDuration.description: Duration of the game in milliseconds

hasWon.description: Indicates whether the game was won (1) or lost (0)

value_dict.1: The game was won
value_dict.0: The game was lost

frame.description: Snapshot of the game at a particular time

expDiff.description: Difference in experience points between teams

champLevelDiff.description: Difference in champion levels between teams

isFirstTower.description: Indicates whether the team was the first to destroy a tower (1) or not (0)

value_dict.0: The team was not the first to destroy a tower
value_dict.1: The team was the first to destroy a tower

isFirstBlood.description: Indicates whether the team was the first to kill an enemy champion (1) or not (0)

value_dict.1: The team was the first to kill an enemy champion
value_dict.0: The team was not the first to kill an enemy champion

killedFireDrake.description: Number of Fire Drakes (dragons) killed by the team
